document.full_text: a new regulatory filing indicates that david sokol was aware in december that lubrizol's chief executive planned to discuss a possible acquisition with the board ' a couple weeks before the top deputy bought shares in the lubricant manufacturer.
document.title: new details emerge on sokol and lubrizol deal
lines_and_colors: a new regulatory filing indicates that david sokol was aware in december that lubrizol's chief executive planned to discuss a possible acquisition with the board ' a couple weeks before the top deputy bought shares in the lubricant manufacturer.
